title: Collaborative Learning Design and Knowledge Management Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Enhances learning design capabilities for undergraduates preparing for professional careers using collaboration tools and knowledge management systems

learning_goals: Learners can share math problem-solving processes and exchange feedback via a collaboration platform
Learners can visualize knowledge structures and design relational networks based on an ontology model
Learners can collaboratively design micro-learning activities with peers and produce outcomes aligned with summative evaluation criteria
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
